last_action: click on the "Theme" located at upper middle and left.
reflect_result:
By clicking on the "Theme" option, you have accessed the theme customization settings. In the current screenshot, you can now see a selection of color themes that can be applied to your keyboard. The available options allow you to change the color of the keyboard to suit your preference, which directly addresses your request to change the keyboard's appearance. 

This action has made progress toward completing your request, as you are now in the appropriate section to customize the keyboard's theme.
